rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space that adheres to Vastu principles with a north-east facing entrance.

rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan area combining living and dining spaces, with a central courtyard view for natural light and ventilation. Includes wheelchair accessible pathways.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Integrated open kitchen adjacent to the dining area, featuring modern amenities while respecting Chettinad design elements.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A well-lit guest bedroom with easy access and a view of the central courtyard. Vastu compliant layout for comfort.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom including an ensuite bathroom, designed for privacy and comfort. Accessible routes maintained throughout.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible bathroom attached to the master bedroom, featuring grab bars and non-slip surfaces.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Open-air courtyard at the core of the design for natural light, ventilation, and adherence to Vastu principles. Acts as a transitional space connecting indoor areas.

openings.description: A grand entrance with appropriate lighting and ramp for wheelchair access.
Separate entry for servants' quarters ensuring privacy while maintaining accessibility features.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: Second bedroom to enhance space utilization, with windows positioned for natural light in accordance with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Service Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated area for servants or staff, located on the split-level layout with necessary amenities and a private bathroom.

openings.description: Balcony providing views over the courtyard and additional access to outdoor spaces, designed for ease of movement.

rooms.name: Utility Space
rooms.description: Concealed area for storage and minor utility work, accessible from the ground floor via a gentle slope.

rooms.name: Additional Utility Area / Meditation Room
rooms.description: A flexible area that can serve as a meditation space or extra storage, designed for quiet reflection with Vastu principles in mind.
